response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you, worth $1,000,000 in your eyes. I am offering this remarkable item at a special price, which I believe will make it accessible to you without compromising its true worth. My offer stands at $950,000. This is a chance to secure a masterpiece at a premium yet favorable rate.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this exceptional deal. I am looking forward to the possibility of sharing this unique product with you.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
